docs.snippet: Volkswagen Group of America on Tuesday announced a U.S. subsidiary that will manage $2 billion in investments in zero emission vehicle (ZEV) infrastructure and awareness programs over a decade as part of a court settlement on its excess diesel emi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Volkswagen Group of America on Tuesday announced a U.S. subsidiary that will manage $2 billion in investments in zero emission vehicle (ZEV) infrastructure and awareness programs over a decade as part of a court settlement on its excess diesel emissions.

headline.main: Volkswagen Launches U.S. Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Unit
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Launches U.S. Electric Vehicle Infrastructure Unit

docs.snippet: Britain's Co-operative Group said Richard Pennycook, its CEO who played a key role in steering the group through a 2013 crisis, is to step down on March 1 and be succeeded by Steve Murrells, the current boss of the group's food business....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's Co-operative Group said Richard Pennycook, its CEO who played a key role in steering the group through a 2013 crisis, is to step down on March 1 and be succeeded by Steve Murrells, the current boss of the group's food business.

headline.main: Co-op 'Saviour' Richard Pennycook to Step Down as CEO

docs.snippet: A U.S. judge on Tuesday held off ruling on whether to throw out a government complaint against billionaire investor Leon Cooperman and his firm, Omega Advisors Inc, after the defendant's attorneys requested a dismissal, in a case that could set a ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. judge on Tuesday held off ruling on whether to throw out a government complaint against billionaire investor Leon Cooperman and his firm, Omega Advisors Inc, after the defendant's attorneys requested a dismissal, in a case that could set a legal precedent on insider trading.

headline.main: Judge Defers Ruling on Dismissal of Cooperman Insider Trading Case
